Description: Error class.Value 0: Error class 0Value 1: Error class 1Value 2: Error class 2Value 3: Error class 3Value 4: Error class 4
Parameter address via fieldbus: CANopen 303C:2hModbus 15364Profibus 15364CIP 160.1.2ModbusTCP 15364EtherCAT 303C:2hPROFINET 15364

Description: Error code.Reading this parameter copies the entire entry forthe detected error (error class, time of detection oferror, ...) to an intermediate memory from whichthe elements of the detected error can then beread.In addition, the read pointer of the error memory isautomatically set to the next error entry.
Parameter address via fieldbus: CANopen 303C:1hModbus 15362Profibus 15362CIP 160.1.1ModbusTCP 15362EtherCAT 303C:1hPROFINET 15362

Description: Motor current at the time the error was detected.In increments of 0.01 Arms.
Parameter address via fieldbus: CANopen 303C:9hModbus 15378Profibus 15378CIP 160.1.9ModbusTCP 15378EtherCAT 303C:9hPROFINET 15378
CANopen 303B:2hModbus 15108Profibus 15108CIP 159.1.2ModbusTCP 15108EtherCAT 303B:2hPROFINET 15108

Description: Additional information on detected error.This entry contains additional information on thedetected error, depending on the error number.Example: a parameter address
